short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to get the color code of any pixel on the web page. It also offers trendy color palettes and css gradients

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Smart Color Palette is a great extension that provides the list of used colors used on any webpage along with Eye Dropper tool to grab any color. Users can find lot of popular and most trendy color palettes and css gradients.

Some core features:

✅ Grab any color with the new color picker or Eye Dropper tool
✅  See all the colors are used in any webpage
✅  Provides trendy CSS Gradients
✅  Get tons of popular and elegant color palettes
✅  Get standard and Web safe color codes
✅  Create a lot of your own color palettes with an amazing color picker
✅  Cool User interface

Developed with ❤️ by Rahul Baruri
